page.title: 12Importance of television
page.content: The television plays an increasingly important part in our lives both as a means of entertainment and as an information service. We did a survey of 60 pupils to find how important the television actually was. Both parents and children watched an average between 20 & 50 hours a week, although parents tended to watch less than their children. Television was seen as an important means of entertainment with "soap operas" such as "Dallas" & "Coronation Street";,comedies and light drama series are also very popular. Television was also seen as an important information service with 98% of the survey population keeping in touch with the worldwide news through television rather than through radio and newspapers.
